name: Local Accounts Discovery
description: Local accounts, System Owner/User discovery using operating systems utilities
author: Timur Zinniatullin, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community

detection.condition: (selection_cmd and not filter_cmd) or (selection_net and not filter_net) or 1 of selection_other_*

falsepositives: Legitimate administrator or user enumerates local users for legitimate reason
